original_text: And the four angels were loosed, which were prepared for an hour, and a day, and a month, and a year, for to slay the third part of men.
korean_text: 네 천사가 놓였으니 그들은 그 년 월 일 시에 이르러 사람 삼분의 일을 죽이기로 준비된 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: And the four angels were loosed
which were prepared for an hour
and a day, and a month, and a year
sentences.korean_translation: 하루와 한 달과 한 년 동안

sentences.original_text: for to slay the third part of men
